query: SELECT 'gallery_items' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM gallery_items UNION ALL SELECT 'testimonials', COUNT(*) FROM testimonials UNION ALL SELECT 'team_members', COUNT(*) FROM team_members UNION ALL SELECT 'services', COUNT(*) FROM services;
